title: China COVID cases could double next month, as Merck antiviral gets approval
text:
The U.K. health firm Airfinity estimates that daily Chinese COVID-19 infections will peak in the middle of January, at 3.7 million, from a current 1.8 million. Another wave will then occur in March, where cases will reach 4.2 million per day, Airfinity estimates. The Airfinity numbers are far higher than official estimates.

Deaths will total 1.7 million by the end of April 2023, from 100,000 now, Airfinity said.

The Airfinity model is based on data from China's regional provinces along with case growth in other former zero-COVID countries such as Hong Kong and Japan.

China COVID cases could double next month, as Merck antiviral gets approval
